displayTitle: Myer is an authority on trends this A/W18 season. This Learning Moment covers eight key trends for the autumn/winter season, providing you with the tools needed to educate your customers on how to wear these key winter pieces. There’s literally something for everyone – no matter the size, age or gender, Myer’s got you covered. Read on and get set to feel the season!
title: Text Title

body: We love a floral print at Myer, and this season the trend is blossoming. Cruise through winter by adding a touch of spring to your step in flowing, feminine, inherently romantic floral prints, featured across dresses, tops and skirts. With hundreds of styles to choose from, there’s bound to be something to pique your interest.
title: Text Title

_items.body:
• Floral tops and dresses are this season’s staples – think pretty ruffle-sleeved tops, flirty minis and full-tiered maxis.

• Pair fashion-forward florals with a defiant leather jacket thrown over the shoulder for a harmonious balance of femme and fierce.

• Don’t be afraid to print clash – we’re not! Try mixing your florals up by pairing big bold florals with smaller prints.

• Floral tops and dresses are this season’s staples – think pretty ruffle-sleeved tops, flirty minis and full-tiered maxis.

• Pair fashion-forward florals with a defiant leather jacket thrown over the shoulder for a harmonious balance of femme and fierce.

• Don’t be afraid to print clash – we’re not! Try mixing your florals up by pairing big bold florals with smaller prints.

• Don’t be afraid to print clash – we’re not! Try mixing your florals up by pairing big bold florals with smaller prints.

• Floral tops and dresses are this season’s staples – think pretty ruffle-sleeved tops, flirty minis and full-tiered maxis.

• Pair fashion-forward florals with a defiant leather jacket thrown over the shoulder for a harmonious balance of femme and fierce.

• Don’t be afraid to print clash – we’re not! Try mixing your florals up by pairing big bold florals with smaller prints.

• Would you like me to show you the perfect bag to complement this Leona by Leona Edmiston frock?

• There’s a gorgeous Basque wide-leg pant that goes beautifully with that floral print top. How about trying them together?
_items.title: CUSTOMER CONVERSATION TIPS
BRANDS SPORTING THE LOOK
_items.body: Basque, Piper, Piper Swimwear, Grab, Hi There from Karen Walker, Jayson Brunsdon, Leona by Leona Edmiston, Miss Shop, Tokito, Trent Nathan, Wayne Cooper and national brands and concessions

body: A leather jacket is a wardrobe staple, especially this season. Whether your style is blazer, bomber or biker, Myer’s got you covered. There’ll be over 50 styles available across our stores and online – with a price range to suit all wallets – including pleather (jackets from $89), suede and suedette options, the other hot-ticket items to get you through the cold.
title: Text Title

_items.body:
• Watch out for newness in colours this season, including pinks, reds and greys to name a few. (But never fear: classic black still reigns supreme.)

• Make the most of your biker jacket’s versatility: pair it with a romantic floral maxi dress or wed it with jeans and a slogan sweat.

• To add a feminine edge to a leather or pleather skirt, try teaming it with a fine knit or floral top.

• Watch out for newness in colours this season, including pinks, reds and greys to name a few. (But never fear: classic black still reigns supreme.)

• Have you thought about buying a leather jacket as your investment piece this season?

• That burgundy pleather Piper skirt looks sensational with this cherry-red sweater tucked into it. Would you like to try the red-on-red trend?

body: This season’s key trend item embraces all that’s good about winter: getting cosy, snuggly and warm. It’s the hottest trend to hit the runway and will make your wardrobe sizzle too. Inject some glam into your life with the 30-plus faux fur styles across Myer’s women’s and youth departments, from full-length coats to fur-trimmed bomber jackets.
title: Text Title

_items.body:
• This season faux furs come in everything from dusty pinks to playful brights – you’ll find a colour for any occasion.

• Try pairing a luxe fur coat with a graphic tee and jeans for relaxed weekend style, or dress it up with the latest floral dress.

• Faux-fur trims, such as a collar on a jacket or coat, add a touch of offbeat glamour to any outfit.

• This season faux furs come in everything from dusty pinks to playful brights – you’ll find a colour for any occasion.

• Try pairing a luxe fur coat with a graphic tee and jeans for relaxed weekend style, or dress it up with the latest floral dress.

• Faux-fur trims, such as a collar on a jacket or coat, add a touch of offbeat glamour to any outfit.

• This season faux furs come in everything from dusty pinks to playful brights – you’ll find a colour for any occasion.

• Try pairing a luxe fur coat with a graphic tee and jeans for relaxed weekend style, or dress it up with the latest floral dress.

• Faux-fur trims, such as a collar on a jacket or coat, add a touch of offbeat glamour to any outfit.

• Can I show you Wayne Cooper's faux fur jacket? It will dress up any outfit, and add warmth over the winter months.

• Fur-trimmed bomber jackets are hot this season. Would you like to try one with those skinny jeans?
_items.title: CUSTOMER CONVERSATION TIPS
BRANDS SPORTING THE LOOK
_items.body:
Basque, Piper, Grab, Jane Lamerton, Leona Edmiston, Miss Shop, Regatta, Tokito, Wayne Cooper and national brands and concessions.
Check out the video below to see Grab's bomber jacket in motion.

body: Red is the colour of the season. Turn up the heat by adding fiery footwear and bold accessories or, if you dare, go full red-to-toe. Either way, embrace the power of this timeless beauty.
title: Text Title

_items.body:
• You can’t have too much red this season.

• Combine two (or more) pieces of the same shade or try a mix of hues – merlot and burgundy work well together.

• Try mixing and matching red textures and patterns too.

• You can’t have too much red this season.

Check out the video below to see Wayne Cooper's dress in motion.

body: Add interest to your morning routine by incorporating this season’s check trend, the long-awaited workwear palate cleanser – which also transitions seamlessly to after-five-wear.
title: Text Title

_items.body:
• The check trend has everything covered this season: jackets, blazers, suiting, tops, dresses, skirts and coats.

• A check blazer is a wardrobe staple and a great investment piece. It’s versatile too, equally at home paired with jeans or a pretty frock.

• Try mixing checks with ruffles to add a feminine twist.

• The check trend has everything covered this season: jackets, blazers, suiting, tops, dresses, skirts and coats.

• A check blazer is a wardrobe staple and a great investment piece. It’s versatile too, equally at home paired with jeans or a pretty frock.

• Try mixing checks with ruffles to add a feminine twist.

• The check trend has everything covered this season: jackets, blazers, suiting, tops, dresses, skirts and coats.

• A check blazer is a wardrobe staple and a great investment piece. It’s versatile too, equally at home paired with jeans or a pretty frock.

• Try mixing checks with ruffles to add a feminine twist.

_items.title: CUSTOMER CONVERSATION TIPS
_items.body:
• Can I show you how to transform those Tokito tailored check pants from officewear to evening wear simply by changing the top?

• These Christie Nicolaides earrings contrast beautifully with that check dress. Would you like to see what I mean?
Basque, Piper, Jane Lamerton, Milk & Honey, Miss Shop, Tokito and national brands and concessions
_items.title: BRANDS SPORTING THE LOOK

body: Velvet and velour have made a comeback for A/W18 and are this season’s essential fabrics. Lush, plush and pleasing to the touch, they provide a luxurious lift to any wardrobe. Dare to wear in bold brights or jewel tones – you won’t be able to resist our range of jackets, coats, jumpsuits, dresses and sweatpants.
title: Text Title

_items.body:
• Pare back luxurious velvets and velours in rich gem tones with low-key neutral accessories for a relaxed daytime look.

• Alternatively, don’t hold back! Match with some sequins for a bold night out.

• For just a touch of luxe, velvet and velour make a great trim on romantic florals or a check pant.

• Pare back luxurious velvets and velours in rich gem tones with low-key neutral accessories for a relaxed daytime look.

• Alternatively, don’t hold back! Match with some sequins for a bold night out.

• For just a touch of luxe, velvet and velour make a great trim on romantic florals or a check pant.

_items.title: CUSTOMER CONVERSATION TIPS
_items.body:
• Let me show you how to style this velvet Piper dress with a neutral clutch and shoes.

• What about trying a velvet jacket with that outfit? It would be the perfect finishing touch and take things to a whole new level.

Basque, Piper, Grab Denim, Jane Lamerton, Jayson Brunsdon, L/A Collective, Leona Edmiston, Milk & Honey, Miss Shop, Tokito, Wayne Cooper and national brands and concessions.

Check out the video below to see Milk and Honey's velvet slip dress in motion.
_items.title: BRANDS SPORTING THE LOOK

body: The denim domination continues! Whether it’s raw edges, split hems, boyfriend-style or super skinny, the options are endless. Classic indigo denim is making a comeback, along with the double-denim combo. Come and get kitted out with the whole look, including logo tees and sweats to rock your denim.
title: Text Title

_items.body:
• When shopping for jeans, there are a number of factors to consider, including brand, wash and colour, distress and trend details, and fit. See the Denim for Women and Denim for Men Learning Moments for everything you need to know.

• If you’re going denim-on-denim – say a trucker jacket paired with skinny jeans – elevate your outfit with stiletto pumps and bright red lipstick!

• Remember: denim doesn’t have to mean blue. There are other colours to play with too.

• When shopping for jeans, there are a number of factors to consider, including brand, wash and colour, distress and trend details, and fit. See the Denim for Women and Denim for Men Learning Moments for everything you need to know.

_items.title: CUSTOMER CONVERSATION TIPS
_items.body:
• Those Miss Shop Riley jeans look fabulous with a black-leather biker jacket and combat boots. Would you like to try that look? By the way, the Riley jeans are so well priced at only $49, aren't they?

• Can I get you a pair of denim jeans to tuck that floral blouse into?

Piper, Piper Women, Grab, Miss Shop, Regatta and national brands and concessions.
Check out the video below to see Miss Shop denim in motion.
_items.title: BRANDS SPORTING THE LOOK

body: This season’s must-have sleeve details are anything but expected or ordinary. Step up your style game with frills, flounces and ruffles, the main protagonists adorning the arms of tops, dresses and jackets in-store. And remember: the more drama the better!
title: Text Title

_items.body:
• The drama of the sleeve is the focal point, so you can keep your accessories to a minimum.

• Dress these statement pieces up with faux fur or down with denim to add drama both night and day.

• Pair your statement top with slim pants or your favourite jeans to create a look that works equally well in the office and for a night on the town.

• The drama of the sleeve is the focal point, so you can keep your accessories to a minimum.

• Dress these statement pieces up with faux fur or down with denim to add drama both night and day.

• Pair your statement top with slim pants or your favourite jeans to create a look that works equally well in the office and for a night on the town.

• The drama of the sleeve is the focal point, so you can keep your accessories to a minimum.

• Dress these statement pieces up with faux fur or down with denim to add drama both night and day.

• Pair your statement top with slim pants or your favourite jeans to create a look that works equally well in the office and for a night on the town.

• Can I show you how to add structure to that Basque ruffle sleeve top with a tailored wide-leg pant?

• All you need to complete that lace dress with sleeve drama is some simple, classic pumps. Would you like to try a pair on?
_items.title: CUSTOMER CONVERSATION TIPS
BRANDS SPORTING THE LOOK
_items.body:
